title: Bugsplat
body: Everytime I load into a game I crash and get a  bugsplat. It happened after I went to my config and chose to open it with adobe rather than notepad. I have reinstalled League twice and also done multiple repairs but it still wont work.

replies.body: I don't recommend trying to modify your files, as that will likely cause more trouble than resolve.  Are you currently running any third party programs that interact with league?  If you have apps like play.tv or overwolf as examples, disable them and test it out in a custom.  Let me know if that doesn't help!
this is happening to me as well, I have been punished for 5 games due to leavebuster now I tried to do another full repair and I got a bugsplat during the repair.... sooooo now what

I now have a ban for leaving too many games which is not in my control. Please help me with a solution this is incredibly frustrating to deal with.
I don't have any third party programs running

There may be other issues causing your game to crash like outdated drivers or bad game files.  As a next step, go through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a series of instructions to troubleshoot with.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up!
